title: Shipping industry could lose $10 billion a year battling climate change by 2050
description: Shipping is at increasing risk from tropical storms, inland flooding, sea level rise, drought and extreme heat.
content: Severe drought has caused water levels in the Mississippi River to drop so low that ships have been running aground. To keep commerce flowing, the U.S. Army Corps of Engineers is now using a dredge s… [+3987 chars]
de: Bis zum Jahr 2050 könnte die Schifffahrtsindustrie durch den Kampf gegen den Klimawandel jährlich 10 Milliarden US-Dollar verlieren. Die Schifffahrt ist durch tropische Stürme, Überschwemmungen im Landesinneren, den Anstieg des Meeresspiegels, Dürre und extreme Hitze zunehmend gefährdet.
en: Shipping industry could lose $10 billion a year battling climate change by 2050. Shipping is at increasing risk from tropical storms, inland flooding, sea level rise, drought and extreme heat.
la: Shipping industriam amittere potuit $10 miliardis per annum in certamina climatis mutationem per 2050. Shipping in periculo augetur a procellis tropicis, inundatione mediterraneo, oriundo gradu maris, siccitate et calore maximo.

title: Atlantic hurricane season will be still dangerous to US in October
description: Even though the climatological peak of hurricane season – Sept. 10 – was weeks ago, residents living along the East and Gulf coasts shouldn't let their guard down in October.
content:
Even though the climatological peak of hurricane season Sept. 10 was weeks ago, residents living along the East and Gulf coasts of the U.S. shouldn’t let their guard down in October.
October ranks a… [+3408 chars]
de: Die Hurrikansaison im Atlantik wird auch im Oktober für die USA gefährlich sein. Auch wenn der klimatologische Höhepunkt der Hurrikansaison – der 10. September – schon Wochen her ist, sollten die Bewohner der Ost- und Golfküste im Oktober nicht nachlassen.
en: Atlantic hurricane season will be still dangerous to US in October. Even though the climatological peak of hurricane season – Sept. 10 – was weeks ago, residents living along the East and Gulf coasts shouldn't let their guard down in October.
la: Tempus tempestatis Atlantici mense Octobri adhuc periculosum erit. Etiamsi climatologicum cacumen temporis procellae – 10 Sept. abhinc hebdomades fuit, incolas orientis et sinus in ora habitantes mense Octobri non dimittet.

title: Philippe Storm Path Raises Concern for 'Dangerous' Flash Flooding

content:
Post-tropical cyclone Philippe is barreling toward the Northeast, posing a "dangerous" risk of flash flooding for the already sodden states in the region.
As of Friday morning, Philippe had been dow… [+3299 chars]
de: Philippe Storm Path gibt Anlass zur Sorge vor „gefährlichen“ Sturzfluten. Der posttropische Wirbelsturm könnte auch mit einem weiteren Sturm verschmelzen, der sich im Atlantik zusammenbraut.
en: Philippe Storm Path Raises Concern for 'Dangerous' Flash Flooding. The post-tropical cyclone could also merge with another storm brewing in the Atlantic.
la: Philippus Storm Path Sollicitudinem movet pro 'Periculo' Flash Inundatio. Cyclus post-tropicus cum alia tempestate in Atlantico misceri potuit.

Die wenigen Stürme, die in diesem Hurrikan auf Land trafen, sind …

title: Tropical Storm Tammy is forecast to bring heavy rain to the Caribbean this weekend
description: Forecasters say the storm system could gradually strengthen, nearing hurricane force and bringing heavy rainfall as it makes landfall in the Leeward Islands on Friday.
content:
Tropical Storm Tammy is moving west towards the Leeward Islands with sustained wind speeds of 60 mph.
National Hurricane Center
A tropical storm that's churning in the North Atlantic ocean is expec… [+2930 chars]
de: Der Tropensturm Tammy wird an diesem Wochenende voraussichtlich starken Regen in die Karibik bringen. Prognostiker gehen davon aus, dass sich das Sturmsystem allmählich verstärken könnte, die Stärke eines Hurrikans erreicht und starke Regenfälle mit sich bringt, wenn es am Freitag auf den Inseln unter dem Winde auf Land trifft.
en: Tropical Storm Tammy is forecast to bring heavy rain to the Caribbean this weekend. Forecasters say the storm system could gradually strengthen, nearing hurricane force and bringing heavy rainfall as it makes landfall in the Leeward Islands on Friday.

title: Atlantic hurricanes rapidly gaining strength along US East Coast, study says

en: Atlantic hurricanes rapidly gaining strength along US East Coast, study says. Hurricanes spinning across the Atlantic Ocean are now more than twice as likely to strengthen from a weak Category 1 storm to a major Category 3 hurricane in just 24 hours, new research finds, with US East Coast cities poised to take a critical hit.  Over the…

title: Atlantic hurricanes are getting stronger, faster, study finds
description: Hurricanes in the Atlantic Ocean are now twice as likely to grow from a weak storm into a major Category 3 or higher hurricane within just 24 hours, according to a study published Thursday.
content:
When hurricanes intensify so quickly, it becomes more difficult to forecast how severely places will be affected. In the worst cases, officials may be left without time to order evacuations.
This ne… [+3970 chars]
de: Studienergebnisse zeigen, dass Hurrikane im Atlantik immer stärker und schneller werden. Laut einer am Donnerstag veröffentlichten Studie ist die Wahrscheinlichkeit, dass sich Hurrikane im Atlantischen Ozean innerhalb von nur 24 Stunden von einem schwachen Sturm zu einem schweren Hurrikan der Kategorie 3 oder höher entwickeln, doppelt so hoch.
en: Atlantic hurricanes are getting stronger, faster, study finds. Hurricanes in the Atlantic Ocean are now twice as likely to grow from a weak storm into a major Category 3 or higher hurricane within just 24 hours, according to a study published Thursday.
la: Oceani Atlantici convalescunt, velocius, studium invenit. Procellae in Oceano Atlantico nunc bis sicut verisimile est crescere ex debili tempestate in maiorem Categoriam 3 aut altiorem procellam intra tantum 24 horas, secundum studium Iovis divulgatum.

title: Atlantic hurricanes strengthening faster due to climate change, study finds
description: Atlantic hurricanes are now more likely to quickly strengthen from weak storms than during the 1970s and 80s, according to new research published Thursday, which warned of an increasing risk to coastal communities.
content: Atlantic hurricanes are now more likely to quickly strengthen from weak storms than during the 1970s and 80s, according to new research published Thursday, which warned of an increasing risk to coast… [+2649 chars]
de: Laut Studie verstärken sich atlantische Hurrikane aufgrund des Klimawandels schneller. Laut einer am Donnerstag veröffentlichten neuen Studie, die vor einem zunehmenden Risiko für Küstengemeinden warnte, ist es jetzt wahrscheinlicher, dass sich Hurrikane im Atlantik durch schwache Stürme schneller verstärken als in den 1970er und 1980er Jahren.
en: Atlantic hurricanes strengthening faster due to climate change, study finds. Atlantic hurricanes are now more likely to quickly strengthen from weak storms than during the 1970s and 80s, according to new research published Thursday, which warned of an increasing risk to coastal communities.
la: turbines Atlantici propter mutationem climatis citius confirmandi studium invenit. Turbines Atlantici nunc magis verisimile sunt ab infirmis tempestatibus cito confirmari quam annis 1970 et 80s, secundum novas investigationes in cena Domini edita, quae monuerunt de periculo augendo communitatibus maritimis.

Neither are a threat to the US, but Norma has triggered hurricane … [+3118 chars]

en: Hurricanes will strike land this weekend by two different oceans. Two hurricanes will strike land this weekend by two different ocean basins -- Tammy in the Atlantic and Norma in the eastern Pacific.
la: Procellae terram hanc volutpat duobus diversis oceanis percutient. Duae procellae terram hanc volutpat per duos pelves diversae oceani ferient - Tammy in Atlantico et Norma in Pacifico Orientali.

title: HMAS Australia Is First Ship Ever Hit by Kamikaze Attack (1944)
description: In Japanese, kamikaze means "divine wind," a reference to the typhoon that foiled the Mongol invasion of Japan in 1281. In World War II, the term was used for Japanese pilots who made deliberate suicidal crashes into enemy targets. Such attacks sank 34 ships …

de: HMAS Australia ist das erste Schiff, das jemals von einem Kamikaze-Angriff getroffen wurde (1944). Auf Japanisch bedeutet Kamikaze „göttlicher Wind“ und bezieht sich auf den Taifun, der 1281 die mongolische Invasion in Japan vereitelte. Im Zweiten Weltkrieg wurde der Begriff für japanische Piloten verwendet, die absichtlich selbstmörderische Abstürze auf feindliche Ziele durchführten. Bei solchen Angriffen wurden 34 Schiffe versenkt …
en: HMAS Australia Is First Ship Ever Hit by Kamikaze Attack (1944). In Japanese, kamikaze means "divine wind," a reference to the typhoon that foiled the Mongol invasion of Japan in 1281. In World War II, the term was used for Japanese pilots who made deliberate suicidal crashes into enemy targets. Such attacks sank 34 ships …
la: HMAS Australia Prima Navis Ever Hit Kamikaze Attack (1944). In Iaponia, kamikaze significat "ventum divinum" referentia ad typhonium, quod invasionem Mongol in Iaponiae anno 1281 scatebat. In bello mundano secundo adhibitum est nomen gubernatorum Iaponum, qui ruinas funestas deliberatas in scuta hostium fecerunt. Talis impetus demersit 34 naves.

title: Hurricanes are now twice as likely to zip from minor to whopper than decades ago, study says
description: With warmer oceans serving as fuel, Atlantic hurricanes are now more than twice as likely as before to rapidly intensify from wimpy minor hurricanes to powerful and catastrophic, a study said Thursday.
content: Rescue workers with Tidewater Disaster Response wade through a tidal surge on a highway while looking for people in need of help after the Steinhatchee River flooded on, Aug 30, 2023, in Steinhatchee… [+5772 chars]
de: Laut einer Studie ist die Wahrscheinlichkeit, dass sich Hurrikane von schwach zu heftig entwickeln, heute doppelt so hoch wie vor Jahrzehnten. Da wärmere Ozeane als Treibstoff dienen, ist die Wahrscheinlichkeit, dass atlantische Hurrikane sich schnell von schwächlichen kleineren Hurrikanen zu starken und katastrophalen Hurrikanen entwickeln, mehr als doppelt so hoch wie zuvor, heißt es in einer Studie vom Donnerstag.
en: Hurricanes are now twice as likely to zip from minor to whopper than decades ago, study says. With warmer oceans serving as fuel, Atlantic hurricanes are now more than twice as likely as before to rapidly intensify from wimpy minor hurricanes to powerful and catastrophic, a study said Thursday.
la: Turbines nunc bis sicut verisimile est avi a minore ad whopper quam ante decenniis, studium dicit. In oceanis calidioribus ut cibus servientes, hurricanes Atlantici nunc sunt plus quam duplo verisimile ac ante ad celerius augendam ab wimpy minorum turbinum ad potentes et calamitosos, studium Iovis dictum.

title: Hurricane Norma Makes Landfall Near Mexico's Los Cabos And Tammy Hits Tiny Barbuda In The Caribbean
description: Both storms were Category 1 hurricanes when they hit.

en: Hurricane Norma Makes Landfall Near Mexico's Los Cabos And Tammy Hits Tiny Barbuda In The Caribbean. Both storms were Category 1 hurricanes when they hit.
la: Procellae Norma Landfall prope Mexico scriptor Los Cabos et Tammy Hits Vegrandis Barbuda in Caribbean. Ambae procellae categoriae 1 turbinum erant cum feriunt.

title: Norma downgraded to tropical storm in Mexico as Hurricane Tammy leaves minor damage in Caribbean
description: Once a Category 4 hurricane, Norma came ashore Saturday as a Category 1 near the Pacific resort of Los Cabos at the southern tip of Mexico's Baja California Peninsula. Tens of thousands were left without power.

de: „Norma“ wurde in Mexiko zum Tropensturm herabgestuft, da Hurrikan Tammy in der Karibik geringfügige Schäden hinterließ. Norma, einst ein Hurrikan der Kategorie 4, landete am Samstag als Hurrikan der Kategorie 1 in der Nähe des pazifischen Ferienortes Los Cabos an der Südspitze der mexikanischen Halbinsel Baja California. Zehntausende blieben ohne Strom.
en: Norma downgraded to tropical storm in Mexico as Hurricane Tammy leaves minor damage in Caribbean. Once a Category 4 hurricane, Norma came ashore Saturday as a Category 1 near the Pacific resort of Los Cabos at the southern tip of Mexico's Baja California Peninsula. Tens of thousands were left without power.
la: Norma inclinata ad tempestatem tropicam in Mexico quam Procellae Tammy relinquit minor damna in Caribbean. Postquam categoria 4 turbinis, Norma in terram Saturni venit ut Categoria 1 prope Pacificum de Los Cabos in extremitate meridionali Peninsulae Mexici Baja Californiae. Decem millia sine virtute relicti sunt.
